text: Everson Bispo Pereira (born 24 July 1997), better known as just Everson, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a Defender for Bahia. ==Professional career== Everson made his professional debut for Bahia in a 1-1 Campeonato Brasileiro Série A tie with Coritiba on 20 September 2017. On 15 July 2019, Everson joined Portimonense on loan in the Portuguese Primeira Liga. ==International career== Everson represented the Brazil U20s in a 2-1 win over the Uruguay U20s on 15 October 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Salvador, Bahia Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazil under-20 international footballers Category:Brazil youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Portimonense S.C. players Category:Esporte Clube Bahia players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal
